description: Enterprise techniques used by certutil, ATT&CK software S0160 v1.1
name: certutil (S0160)

techniques.comment: certutil has been used to decode binaries hidden inside certificate files as Base64 information.[3]
certutil can be used to download files from a given URL.[1][4]

certutil can be used to install browser root certificates as a precursor to performing man-in-the-middle between connections to banking websites. Example command: certutil -addstore -f -user ROOT ProgramData\cert512121.der.[2]
